page.title: 05My Day K.Walters.2 Ashford C
page.content: my hair, brushed my teeth,washed my face and got in to bed at 8 o'clock. Moira Walters.Mum. I got up at 9.o'clock.Washed,dressed, combed hair and had breakfast. Made my bed.Then loaded the washing machine. Helped clear away breakfast table.Had a cup of coffee.Supervised preparation of lunch.I hoovered.Put washing out. Took in dry clothes.Had lunch.Watched T.V.Played game with Kate for a while. Washed tea things.Helped girls wash hair.Saw'News' and T.V. till 9,oo p.m. Had bath,went to bed. Julian Walters.Dad. Wife, Moira Walters, recovering after wrist op.Got up,washed,cleaned teeth, got dressed.8.30 a.m Let dog and cats out.Made tea for Moira.Asked children to lay breakfast.Buried dead rat caught by cats.Made boiled eggs and toast for family's breakfast.Did some
